dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...I mean, you know, they always do the follow-up. 'Hero meets rescued person.' It's like, a classic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...I mean, you know, they always do the follow-up. 'Hero meets rescued person.' It's like, a classic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but, uh, this one though. Musa Abdraim? He actually met the little girl he saved at Almaty airport.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but, uh, this one though. Musa Abdraim? He actually met the little girl he saved at Almaty airport.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstani Musa Abdraim, who saved a hostage at Almaty airport, met with the rescued girl.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. And posted it on Instagram, I'm sure. Hashtag blessed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. And posted it on Instagram, I'm sure. Hashtag blessed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He shared the news on his Instagram page. ... He also posted several photos and videos with the girl's family.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he did share photos, but it was the girl's father who reached out, like, to invite him over. That’s pretty cool, no?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he did share photos, but it was the girl's father who reached out, like, to invite him over. That's pretty cool, no?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was revealed that the girl's father contacted the rescuer and invited him over.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Cool. For them, maybe. Still feels a bit, I don't know, staged for the gram.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cool. For them, maybe. Still feels a bit, I don't know, staged for the gram.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Staged? He literally, um, put his own life on the line. Remember? The guy with the kitchen knife.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Staged? He literally, um, put his own life on the line. Remember? The guy with the kitchen knife.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...on March 7, Kazakhstanis were shocked by the news of a man armed with a kitchen knife taking an Almaty airport employee hostage. ... This was made possible by a brave man"Musa Abdraim"who offered himself in place of the hostage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that was the same one? The Almaty airport thing. Yeah, uh, I remember reading something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that was the same one? The Almaty airport thing. Yeah, uh, I remember reading something.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! He offered himself as a hostage. So the little girl, Botagoz’s daughter, could be released. And then he grabbed the knife!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! He offered himself as a hostage. So the little girl, Botagoz's daughter, could be released. And then he grabbed the knife!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The airport employee, named Botagoz, is raising a young daughter. ... To recall, on March 7, Kazakhstanis were shocked by the news of a man armed with a kitchen knife taking an Almaty airport employee hostage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so he, like, disarmed the guy. Still, they give him a medal, right? The 'For Courage' thing? And, uh, that’s that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so he, like, disarmed the guy. Still, they give him a medal, right? The 'For Courage' thing? And, uh, that's that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Seizing the right moment, he managed to grab the knife from the attacker, allowing the police to apprehend him. ... On the same day, by presidential decree, Musa Abdraim was awarded the "For Courage" medal for his courage and selflessness in an extreme situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's not just 'that,' though. I mean, the president, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, himself got involved. Awarded him personally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not just 'that,' though. I mean, the president, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, himself got involved. Awarded him personally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev was informed about the hostage situation at Almaty airport. On the same day, by presidential decree, Musa Abdraim was awarded the "For Courage" medal...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, presidents award medals. It's kinda what they do. Good PR.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, presidents award medals. It's kinda what they do. Good P R.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But think about it. Seven minutes. This whole crazy situation, and he's the one who steps up and stops it. It's not just PR for him, it’s, uh, a real act of selflessness.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But think about it. Seven minutes. This whole crazy situation, and he's the one who steps up and stops it. It's not just P R for him, it's, uh, a real act of selflessness.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Within seven minutes, he was neutralized and detained.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I guess. Until the next hero comes along, or whatever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I guess. Until the next hero comes along, or whatever.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I just think it’s important, you know? To acknowledge people who, like, actually do something incredible. Not just, um, complain about things.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I just think it's important, you know? To acknowledge people who, like, actually do something incredible. Not just, um, complain about things.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Fair enough, I suppose. For the record.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fair enough, I suppose. For the record.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for the record. It's a big deal for that family.
